revised_title: On the Nature of the Force Repelling Bodies from Magnet Poles and Molecular Influences
tldr: The author investigates the force repelling bodies from magnet poles and examines the magnetic properties of wood, concluding that it is always diamagnetic. The study also explores the influence of the shape of magnetic poles, the repulsion of diamagnetic bodies, and the behavior of paramagnetic and diamagnetic bars under various conditions.
